about_the_game:
Collection of 3 Mini Games

  • Featured: "Boat Racer" -  A 3 lap timed race fraught with exploding hazards that you can avoid or shoot with your onboard cannons for time boosts to your turbo charged engine. Takes about 1:20 to complete but VERY high index for replay-ability as you hop back at the start line ready for the next race to try to beat your best scores. Obstacles spawn randomly each game so every race a bit different. Steam Leaderboard ranking available on this game to compare your results with other players

  • "Knazi Knockout" -  Be the hot Girl that pummels Hitler and three of his henchman . You can even go to the locker room and change your attire. It's fun, but once you figure out how to beat these guys you will win every time so the fun becomes changing your outfit

  • "Nazis in the Mist" - Although the title of this package of mini-games is "BOAT RACER", I think this mini-game is the crown jewel of the trilogy. An arena style game with randomly spawning enemies where you try to survive 10 rounds. The story behind the "spawn pods" comes from the larger project still in the works that all 3 of these mini-games were borne from. The Nazis have developed secret weapons that could change the tide of the war and your mission is to capture the blueprints. One such secret weapon is the "STD"  ( Subterranean Troop Deployment ) which is a torpedo like missile that burrows through the ground and pops up on the battlefield. Another secret weapon are Autonomous Super Soldiers ( Robots) - which you hack to be on your side in the fight against evil. That "helper" Robot is also available in this mini game but you can toggle him on/off if you wish to go it alone. Good luck with that! You don't get points for the helper's kills, but he will be a great help in getting you further into the game. Only 10 rounds sounds like a cakewalk but it's actually quite difficult to complete the mission. In many  MANY hours of play testing, I have only succeeded in surviving all 10 rounds ONCE. Steam Leaderboard ranking also available for this mini-game as you can upload your scores even on failed missions. If you see a leaderboard score that seems VERY high - it's because they accomplished the mission - all 10 rounds - and got a 10,000 point bonus

content_descriptors.notes: In two of the minigames ( not "BOAT RACER") you fight Nazi's. In "Knazi Knockout" you beat them up MMA style, in "Nazi's in the Mist" you shoot them in an arena style FPS. The "death" and " gore" is minimal and more toward the cartoonish style than realistic. Images of women in Bikinis also on screen and in  "Knazi Knockout" you can select wardrobe for your female fighter  that can include bikini's or sexy outfits

detailed_description:
Feature List

All 3 mini-games have Steam Leaderboard capability


About the Game

                                                   Collection of 3 Mini Games

  • Featured: "Boat Racer" -  A 3 lap timed race fraught with exploding hazards that you can avoid or shoot with your onboard cannons for time boosts to your turbo charged engine. Takes about 1:20 to complete but VERY high index for replay-ability as you hop back at the start line ready for the next race to try to beat your best scores. Obstacles spawn randomly each game so every race a bit different. Steam Leaderboard ranking available on this game to compare your results with other players

The Nazis have developed secret weapons that could change the tide of the war and your mission is to capture the blueprints. One such secret weapon is the "STD"  ( Subterranean Troop Deployment ) which is a torpedo like missile that burrows through the ground and pops up on the battlefield. You don't get points for the helper's kills, but he will be a great help in getting you further into the game. Only 10 rounds sounds like a cakewalk but it's actually quite difficult to complete the mission. In many  MANY hours of play testing, I have only succeeded in surviving all 10 rounds ONCE. name: Boat Racer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: played on windows 7, 10 and 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: tested on Radeon Graphics 3900, GeForce GTX 950, and above but will most likely play on any computer you have as a Gamer here on Steam
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: it runs fine on my 15 year old computer with GeForce 950

short_description: Three mini games. "Boat Racer" - high replay ability in that obstacles are spawned randomly each race. No 2 races the same."Knazi Knockout" 3rd person brawler - it's just fun to beat up Nazis, right? "Nazi's in the Mist" FPS that is the crown jewel of this trifecta of minigames
